description: {"blocks":[{"key":"eqpgg","text":"This Sirius Red Fast Green protocol is for the Leica ST5020 Automated multistainer. You can use it as a guide to developing your own protocol, catered to the needs of your researchers. This template can be modified for manual staining but thebest and most reproducible results are easier to achieve with an automated stainer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3nds9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hvfd","text":"This fork describes modifications to obtain high-quality special stain demonstrating collagen in FFPE and frozen tissues. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

fork_info.title: Hematoxylin & Eosin Protocol For Leica ST5020 Automated Stainer

{"blocks":[{"key":"depfv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ae7nt","text":"Program the FG/SR protocol into the ST5020 stainer according to the table below","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2e5i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k8j0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5e7ad","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"15utr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"72EE59BC24A411EF8D4F0A58A9FEAC02","height":420,"id":474939,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"7dbjh\",\"text\":\"Steps for staining\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"FGSR protocol.PNG","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qr37js2e.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qr35js2e.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qr36js2e.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qr34js2e.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8thd8","text":"Perform all required maintenance on the stainer and prepare working solutions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8a9ih","text":"Collagen fibers should be stained red and all other non-collagen proteins should be stained green.
